text: Nuko Nyagasani wabo abakirira ubusabe (agira ati) "Mu by’ukuri, jye sinagira impfabusa igikorwa cyakozwe n’umwe muri mwe, yaba uw’igitsina gabo cyangwa uw’igitsina gore, kuko mukomokanaho (murareshya mu guhemberwa ibyo mukora). Bityo babandi bimutse bakanameneshwa mu ngo zabo, bagatotezwa bazira kugana inzira yanjye, bakarwana, bakanicwa, rwose nzabababarira ibyaha byabo nanabinjize mu busitani (Ijuru) butembamo imigezi. Ibyo ni ibihembo biturutse kwa Allah, kandi kwa Allah ni ho hari ibihembo byiza
